headline: Senior Manager - US Poker Operations @ BetMGM | Online Gaming
about:
With a robust, 20+ year background in poker/online gaming and a specialized focus on poker integrity, my role as Senior Manager for US Poker Operations at BetMGM is fueled by a passion for enhancing the player's journey. At the heart of my mission lies the commitment to use data-driven strategies to elevate the user experience and maintain robust player relations. This dedication has been a cornerstone in my career, enabling me to continuously innovate within the competitive landscape of online poker.

The expertise acquired from leading operations and customer experience has empowered our team to surpass key performance indicators and strengthen partnerships within the industry. My competencies in fraud investigations and in-depth knowledge of the poker sector are instrumental in devising initiatives that resonate with our player base in building the trust needed to success in online gaming. Together with my colleagues, we strive to not only meet but exceed expectations, fostering a thriving gaming environment that players trust and enjoy.

headline: CPA-Owner, Joseph L. Rosenberg CPA
about:
Located in Florham Park, New Jersey. Certified Public Accountant since 1974. Own my own C.P.A .firm since 1983 (Website is www.cpajoe.net). Licensed in New Jersey and New York. Certified Quickbooks Professional Advisor. An educator since the late 1980's,  I have taught entrepreneurial subjects (small business taxes, business planning, recordkeeping, and understanding financial statements) at Bergen Community College in Paramus, NJ, and Passaic County Community College in Paterson. Have also taught an introductory course in financial and managerial accounting at New Jersey Institute of Technology (NJIT), tax accounting at Raritan Valley Community College, continuing education classes at County College of Morris, Sussex County Community College, and Warren County Community College, and workshops at the Small Business Administration (SBA)  in Newark, NJ, and for the New Jersey Small Business Development Centers( SBDC). 

Nearby communities to my office in Florham Park, NJ include Livingston, Roseland, West Orange, South Orange, Caldwell, North Caldwell, West Caldwell, Verona, Cedar Grove, South Orange, Millburn, Short Hills, Chatham, Madison, Morristown, East Hanover, Hanover, Whippany.

Specialties: Personal income tax return preparation. Corporate, partnership, LLC and other business tax return preparation.Income tax planning, business planning, business consulting, accounting, recordkeeping, projections, financial statement preparation, including audits, reviews and compilations. I am a certified Quickbooks professional advisor in both the desktop and online editions of Quickbooks. I also work with startups to assist them in entity selection, taxation and getting their books organized.

headline: Cybersecurity GRC Director | Governance, Risk and Compliance Leader
about:
With over a decade of experience in cybersecurity governance, risk, and compliance (GRC), I am passionate about protecting information assets and ensuring compliance with regulatory and industry standards. As the Cybersecurity GRC Director at FanDuel, I lead the Cybersecurity GRC and Identity and Access Management (IAM) team for all FanDuel divisions, supporting the security of confidentiality, availability, and integrity of information, business delivery, and technology.

In my current role, I developed from scratch a cybersecurity department that aligns with policies and government regulations, and that provides approval for business owners to obtain the Authority to Operate. I also cultivate and manage cross-departmental communication and collaboration to evaluate and remediate technical and procedural controls, and to manage cybersecurity findings and exceptions. Some of the skills that I use and demonstrate in my daily work are information security, analytical skills, customer relationship management, and cloud security. I hold the CISSP, CISA, and CRISC certifications, and I am fluent in Spanish and Portuguese. I have experience working with international and domestic regulatory exams and frameworks, such as NIST, ISO, GDPR, and PCI-DSS.

headline: Founding Engineer, ONDEMANDENV | Championing Application-Centric Infrastructure (ACI) & Contract-First Architectures | AWS Terraform CDK, CDK8s& Event-Driven Systems
about:
With over 15 years of architecting and delivering robust Java enterprise solutions, I’ve cultivated a deep mastery of object-oriented design, domain-driven systems, and the art of turning complex business problems into elegant technical realities. My journey began in the trenches of monolithic architectures, but today, I channel that expertise into redefining how distributed systems evolve at scale—because modern infrastructure shouldn’t just work; it should orchestrate itself.

As the creator of ondemandenv, I’ve built a paradigm-shifting platform that treats infrastructure as a collaborative domain-driven ecosystem. Drawing inspiration from DDD’s bounded contexts and federalist governance, the platform enables teams to version, contract, and clone environments (“Envers”) with surgical precision—dissolving age-old AWS deployment deadlocks (like cross-region CloudFormation dependencies) by design. By codifying architectural agreements into a ContractsLib (a constitutional layer for distributed systems), I’ve proven that microservices chaos isn’t inevitable—it’s just a failure of domain modeling.

My philosophy?
Infrastructure is too critical to be left to ad-hoc scripts. Just as OOP taught us to encapsulate state and behavior, modern cloud-native systems demand contractual clarity and environment-as-code rigor. Whether I’m guiding teams to untangle dependency webs or advocating for systems that self-heal through event-driven automation, my mission remains the same: to turn infrastructure into a living, collaborative language—one where every line of CDK code reflects a shared understanding.

Let’s connect if you’re passionate about:
🔹 DDD for infrastructure – Modeling AWS resources as domain entities.
🔹 Decentralized autonomy – Enabling teams to innovate without fracturing systems.
🔹 Killing deployment deadlocks – With contracts, not workarounds.

P.S. If you’ve ever lost sleep over CloudFormation rollbacks or circular dependencies, I’d love to show you how Envers turn “impossible” problems into yesterday’s constraints.

P.S. If you’ve ever lost sleep over Cursor AI piled up unpredictable system, I’d love to show you how I decomposed mountains of generated code into separated and isolated vertical implementations.

projects.description:
As lead infrastructure architect for 'Coke Share a Memory,' I spearheaded the transformation of its AWS platform, addressing critical operational challenges to achieve production readiness, scalability, and resilience. My leadership was key to stabilizing the project and establishing an effective SDLC.
Key Achievements:
Stabilization & Performance: Resolved critical issues like Stable Diffusion worker timeouts by implementing robust infrastructure and deep monitoring, elevating the project from a PoC to a reliable, performant system.
CI/CD & IaC Implementation: Architected and deployed a full CI/CD framework (GitHub Actions, AWS CDK in TypeScript, CodeDeploy), empowering the team with efficient development and iteration capabilities.
Scalable GPU Compute: Engineered an EC2 Image Builder pipeline for optimized custom AMIs, enabling practical and reliable Auto Scaling Groups with GPU instances for demanding ML/media workloads.
Enhanced Observability: Established comprehensive CloudWatch monitoring, logging, and alerting, providing crucial system visibility for proactive issue resolution.

My contributions delivered the stability, automation, and observability essential for the project's successful launch and global operation, supporting a web application with complex backend processes.

headline: Inspired Leadership. Transform. Renew. Create. | Business & Digital Transformation | Industry 4.0
about:
As a multilingual, multi-cultural Tech & Digital Transformation Leader, Strategic Business Partner, Change Agent, Leadership Coach & Entrepreneur with a 20+ year career in IT, Business & ‘Big 4’ Consulting, I bring real-world, pressure-tested expertise in transformational leadership that is deeply rooted in tailored practices of SAFe® Agile, PROSCI® Change, ODF® Org Design, LCP® Leadership Coaching, BRM® Relationship Management, ITIL® Operations and Lean Six Sigma.

I have directed large-scale, globally dispersed technology and automation delivery and operations & business teams across the Americas, Asia-Pacific & Europe, managed global PMOs of $150M+ and solved complex business challenges by delivering game-changing digital solutions that have driven strong financial, operational and regulatory/government compliance performance, satisfied business growth and fueled strategic M&A activities and integrations. I earned MS/BS degrees in Mechanical Engineering.

I have designed, launched, optimized, scaled global IT Delivery & Operations functions via Org Design, Change Management, and Agile, creating, delivering, protecting and enhancing business value and driving customer success at the speed of business. I have led Managed Services (AMS/MSP) Partner selections, negotiations and transitions for Enterprise Applications and Technology Platforms, from on-boarding through steady-state to ITIL-driven high-performance KPI attainment, with real-world results, delivering reliable, predictable, repeatable, scalable capabilities at highly innovative Fortune 500 and agile private companies.

I have built a proven track record of transforming teams and functions from operating within a high-cost/inconsistent performance paradigm to a low cost/high performance paradigm. The unlocked human and financial capital have consistently fueled stellar team morale, successful strategic initiatives and exceptional customer performance.

headline: Senior Financial Advisor | Senior Vice President: Laser-focused on the issues Business Owners, Professional Investors, Corporate Executives, Doctors and Lawyers face on the road to success.
about:
Hello, 

My name is Read Hubbard. I lead The Hubbard Group. We consistently add capacity and expertise to enhance our service model and client experience, which will always be our top priorities.

We help you become even more successful by taking responsibility and guiding you through transitional moments in your lives. We actively seek to free up time and capacity for you , which releases bandwidth, allowing you to focus on and pursue whatever is most important. We are purposeful stewards of your goals and purpose, THE "WHY", not just your assets, liabilities and risks. 

We reverse engineer goals, helping you to better plan for and achieve them, while playing five primary roles; Personal Banking Liaison, Investment Advisor, Wealth Management Planner, Strategic Philanthropic Guide and Friend/Confidante for all matters,.

Our core foundation built on trust. We aspire to work with people we like and respect . . .who hopefully feel similarly about us. We are building relationships, not brokering transactions. Our interests are aligned .You get a team that cares deeply about you and your family.

I am also fortunate and proud to be part of The Erdmann Group. 

All the best and continued success!

Read

A licensed lawyer and financial professional with almost 30 years of experience, from 2001 to 2011, Read was head of trading of Eos Partners, L.P. Prior to Eos, He was an analyst and trader at Kadem Capital. Before that, Read practiced corporate law at Willkie Farr & Gallagher LLP and Clifford Chance LLP.

Read graduated Cum Laude from Harvard College, where he played varsity football and lacrosse. Read is also a graduate of NYU School of Law. Although he is licensed to practice law in NY, CT and the Federal Courts, Read does not offer legal advice in his role as Financial Advisor at Merrill.

Taught the rewarding nature of active philanthropy and the value of making a difference by someone very important in his life, Read volunteers and sits on the boards of of Mission a.k.a. The CT Challenge, The Norwalk Community College Foundation, The New York Executive Board of Harlem Lacrosse and The Open Doors Shelter in Norwalk, CT.

Read is an avid reader (disclaimer - listener via Audible), a bad golfer, a mediocre cross fitter and steadfastly refuses to quit playing lacrosse.

publications.title: The Definitive Guide to PCI DSS Version 4: Documentation, Compliance, and Management
publications.description:
This book is your go-to reference on how to achieve PCI compliance. With more than 400 PCI requirements, the updated PCI Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) v4.0 does not detail the specific documentation that a PCI auditor―known as a Qualified Security Assessor (QSA)―needs to know. This book is the first reference to detail the specific documentation needed for every PCI requirement. The authors provide real-world examples of complying with the 12 main PCI requirements and clarify many of the gray areas within the PCI DSS.
Any merchant or service provider that stores, processes, or transmits credit card data must comply with the PCI Data Security Standard. PCI DSS 1.0 was first published in 2004, yet many of those tasked with PCI compliance still encounter difficulties when trying to make sense of it. PCI DSS version 4 was published in March 2022, and at 360 pages, it has numerous additional requirements, leaving many people struggling to know what they need to do to comply.

PCI DSS v4.0 has a transition period in which PCI DSS version 3.2.1 will remain active for two years from the v4.0 publication date. Although the transition period ends on March 31, 2024, and may seem far away, those tasked with PCI compliance will need every bit of the time to acquaint themselves with the many news updates, templates, forms, and more, that PCI v4.0 brings to their world.

You will:

    Know what it takes to be PCI compliant
    Understand and implement what is in the PCI DSS
    Get rid of cardholder data
    Have everything you need to know about segmenting your cardholder data network
    Know what documentation is needed for your PCI compliance efforts
    Leverage real-world experience to assist PCI compliance work

The Journal's audience is comprised of dedicated professionals charged with implementing security programs, as well as those who create and enforce policies and procedures. headline: EVP, CMO, Author, Speaker, Alchemist & LinkedIn Top Voice
about:
Influence and persuasion, also known as marketing, are part science, part art, and mostly alchemy. I am executive vice president, chief marketing officer (and alchemist-in-residence) at Randa Apparel & Accessories, a multinational consumer products business and one of the world's leading fashion and lifestyle companies.

With over 20 years of experience in the consumer products industry, I specialize in identifying and applying actionable insights, data, story-telling, technology, analytics, and behavioral economics to understand and influence consumer behavior. 

I am honored to collaborate with outstanding executives on strategy, P&L, M&A, Artificial Intelligence, and digital transformation. 

I have oversight of cross-functional teams and agencies across multiple geographies and am responsible for the management of our owned and licensed brand portfolio, consumer insights, intellectual property, and integrated marketing.

It is my good fortune to collaborate with remarkable brands, including Levi’s, Haggar, Dickies, Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein, Columbia Sportswear, Cole Haan, Ralph Lauren, Totes, Isotoner, and Tommy Bahama.

As an alchemist, I transmute marketing into revenues at 20,000 points of sale (and millions of page views) inclusive of Macy’s, Kohl’s, Amazon, Nordstrom, JCPenney, Walmart, Target, Costco, Liverpool, Marks & Spencer, Printemps, and El Cortes Ingles.

Stimulus and response often derive from sharing great stories, I am privileged to speak in public, co-author a best-selling book, and have published many articles. My words and exploits have been shared in the Wall Street Journal, CNBC, CNN, The New York Times, Business Insider, New York Magazine, Women's Wear Daily, Huffington Post, and other media.

Throughout my career, I have been influenced by great companies and leaders, including American Express, Red Cats, QVC, and McKinsey & Company. In particular, I am inspired & challenged by my extraordinary CEO at Randa Apparel & Accessories. 

ALCHEMY: A science or philosophy that transforms something ordinary into something extraordinary, often through mysterious means.

We cannot navigate a new landscape with old maps. 

MEETING REQUESTS:

Please research our company and provide concrete recommendations on how you can add value, your business model, cost metrics, and relevant references so we may respond appropriately.  

You should visit www.randa.net, www.shoptribalfashion.com, www.totes.com, and www.haggar.com. 

Contact information is available at https://randa.net/contact.

publications.title: The alchemist’s top 10 prophecies for what’s next in 2019.
publications.description:
THE RETAIL APOCALYPSE WILL BE FINALLY EXPOSED AS “FAKE NEWS” for math challenged, headline-grabbing media. 

While closed stores and lost retail jobs are painful and disruptive, they are not apocalyptic. Ecommerce will not eat brick-and-mortar for lunch. Online sales get the buzz, but brick-and-mortar gets the money. 

The vast majority of sales, over 85 percent, will continue to take place in brick-and-mortar stores. And, in 2019, physical stores will contribute 50 percent of all retail growth.

publications.title: Retail in 2019, and beyond...
publications.description:
In 2019, regardless of size, tenure or segment of business retailers, brands and suppliers must recognize that they can no longer navigate the new landscape with their old maps. Tomorrow’s winners will be nimble, data-driven, fast to market, and highly efficient.

Tomorrow’s champions will have the foresight, fortitude and fearlessness to disrupt their own identity and historical path to success to succeed in the rapidly evolving retail environment.

Do or do not. There is no try. The rate of change will continue to escalate. There is no time for deep contemplation. Winners will leap, measure and then optimize. Failing fast will be a requirement. Succeeding fast will be a requirement, too.

projects.title: VIKASH JHA | SOLO ART EXHIBITTION NIRVANA: MY JOURNEY TRANSCENDING PHILOSOPHIES
projects.description:
ON VIEW: MAY 18-27, 2024


Acclaimed Indian-American Artist (and Investment Banker) Creating a Unique Path in the United States

Saphira & Ventura Gallery is thrilled to announce solo art show titled “NIRVANA: My Journey Transcending Philosophies” of the internationally recognized artist Vikash Jha featuring selected works created during the last six years. The show will feature works from his art series such as ‘introspection’, ‘transcendence’, ‘confluence’, and ‘global warming’.

As a contemporary abstract expressionist, in his artistic practice, Jha seamlessly intertwines colors, cross-cultural imageries, and philosophies inspired by his upbringing in India and his experiences as an immigrant to the United States. His works reflect a continuous examination of social, cultural, and philosophical issues, capturing the essence of his intellectual curiosity and exploration through unique and contemporary depictions.

Employing a diverse range of mixed media including acrylic, oil, charcoal, pastels, and upcycled materials, Jha’s growing body of works are characterized by their rich texture and layered complexity. He draws inspiration from modern masters like Picasso, de Kooning, Rauschenberg, Basquiat, Joan Mitchell, Rothko, Pollock, Gaitonde, Hussain, among others.

publications.title: Learning the Lessons of Platinum Partners
publications.description: Fund managers and investors can gain valuable insight by examining the Platinum collapse. The combination of investor liquidity, substantial portfolio illiquidity, weak valuation policies and non-traditional compensation methodologies not ideal for an illiquid portfolio allow for conflicts and may harm both manager and investor alike. Designing the proper fund structure and implementing effective policies on valuation, marketing and governance, promote sound management and provide valuable safeguards against regulatory action.

publications.title: Successfully launching a private investment fund
publications.description: It is important to use law firms with corporate, tax and regulatory experience in connection with structuring and maintaining hedge funds. Failure to properly structure your firm will have material opportunity costs. A firm with structural issues is less likely to attract investment and more likely to be plagued with investor litigation, regulatory prosecution, limitation on capital resources and reputational damage. In many cases, the costs associated with fixing a problem far exceed the costs of doing the job correctly at the outset. In certain cases, the problems cannot be fixed.

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: June 10, 2024, Stacy worked with Suzanne E. but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: I came to know Dr. Suzanne Weiss when she was hired by my organization, Newark Community Health Centers, Inc., which is a federally qualified health center (FQHC). At the time, I was the Director of Adult Medicine. My organization was preparing for NCQA Level 3 certification and Dr. Weiss, with her medical expertise and strong healthcare IT background, was hired to assist us in designing the appropriate templates and then to guide our physicians in the new formatting in our clinics. During her time with us, we received our NCQA Level 3 certification. Apart from this undertaking, Dr. Weiss assessed our needs using our software, eClinical Works (eCW), for all our clinical encounters. She clearly understood that the vendor's clinical manual, at 425 pages, would never work for us. She created a new, more useful manual of 38 pages. In addition, using her extensive art background, she utilized Microsoft Publisher to create a trifold for physicians who could use these necessary shortcuts to guide their documentation during clinical rounds. Dr. Weiss is gifted and rare, in that she can use her years in clinical medicine, take that level of understanding and combine it with her role as a subject matter expert on the Healthcare IT side. She serves as the necessary "bridge" between the clinical staff (her peers), the IT department, the C-Suite personnel and the vendor. She has a clear understanding of all sides and knows how to execute the necessary improvements. It was a pleasure working with Dr. Weiss over the many months she was with us. If the occasion should arise, I would welcome the opportunity to work with her again.

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 28, 2023, Melvin managed Suzanne E. directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Dr. Weiss reported to me at ICL. Her role was as an intermediary between our Clinical staff, IT, and our E.H.R vendor.

Suzanne was excellent in this capacity!

As a physician herself, she was able to empathize with our Clinical staff. Having worked with other E.H.R platforms, she was able to explain that all systems have their drawbacks, and the key was to identify what was most important to the Clinical staff. Dr. Weiss was also able to bring examples of issues and errors to our E.H.R vendor meetings. She was a strong voice on behalf of our Clinical users.

I would definitely hire Suzanne again in this role.

about:
"𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗮𝗻𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝗮𝗳𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲?"

I remember road biking in one of my favorite towns.  
I was living in a tiny apartment wondering how anyone could afford to live there. 

Fast forward, I built my dream home in that very same town and continue to live there today.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗶𝗱 𝗜 𝗱𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁?
→ I got some help. 
→ Did some inner work. 
→ Worked hard and was fortunate to have people come into my life that made a significant impact on me.

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗱𝗼 𝗜 𝗱𝗼 𝗻𝗼𝘄?
→ 𝗜 𝗵𝗲𝗹𝗽 𝗳𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗶𝗿 𝘃𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗱𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗺𝘀 𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘆 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗺𝗲.

Here are what some of them have said:
    𝗬𝗼𝘀𝘀𝗶 𝗛𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗼𝗻, 𝗖𝗼-𝗙𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿 & 𝗖𝗘𝗢 𝗼𝗳 𝗠𝗲𝘁𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗮𝗹:
    “Eric’s coaching pushed me to think bigger and bolder with new insights and 
    perspectives. His blend of support and practical advice helped elevate both my business 
    and myself. Highly recommended!” 

    𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗹 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗯𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗮𝗺, 𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗵𝗼𝗿/𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿, 𝗙𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗼𝗳 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗖𝗹𝗼𝗷𝘂𝗿𝗲:
    “Eric’s wise and caring guidance helped me achieve what I couldn’t on my own, 
    especially during a tough personal period. I’m grateful for his support. Highly 
    recommend him to anyone ready to see what they’re truly capable of.”

    𝗝𝗲𝗻𝗻𝗮 𝗚𝘂𝗮𝗿𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗶, 𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿/𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗵𝗼𝗿, 𝗙𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗖𝗘𝗢 𝗼𝗳 𝗝𝗠𝗚 𝗣𝘂𝗯𝗹𝗶𝗰 𝗥𝗲𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀:
    “Eric understands your unique challenges and creates a safe space for growth. His 
    patience and personal approach are unmatched. My coaching experience with 
    him incredible.”

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼 𝗜 𝗱𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀?
I take leaders through a three step process I call 
The Vision Execution Method.

𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗽 𝟭: 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗙𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Most people accidentally compartmentalize their vision and play too small. I help them align deeply and emotionally on what truly matters.

𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗽 𝟮: 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘂𝘁: Most people don’t have systems in place to handle unforeseen problems. I help them put systems in place to anticipate and navigate the unexpected. 

𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗽 𝟯: 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗠𝗼𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗺: Most people struggle knowing how to iterate and adjust, so they maintain momentum. I help them learn how to assess the data and iterate, so the vision keeps growing. 

Curious on next steps? 

→ Bring me your biggest challenge. 
→ We put our heads together on a call. 
→ We will make a dent in it.

She has supported rapidly growing teams by:

headline: Revenue Systems for Series A to C
about:
I work with Series A to C companies to scale their GTM without scaling headcount, and help their existing teams winning faster. I build strategic, bespoke and highly customized revenue systems. 

Whether teams are flooded with inbound leads they can’t qualify or building new account lists to expand: There's more data than anyone can process manually. 

Outreach channels are packed, and GTM playbooks are supplemented - and in parts overtaken - by AI assisted, bespoke systems. 

If your best salesperson had unlimited time to research every account, who would they pick, what would they want to know and say? That's what I build at scale.

I build automated systems that completely change how you spot and connect with ideal customers. 

These systems can find insights that used to require hours of manual research - from earnings call transcripts to website details to hiring patterns - and turn them into actionable signals at scale. 

Instead of relying on basic firmographics, you can now identify prospects based on the rich, specific data points. 

We can start with validating the right qualification process for your business, then gradually automate and integrate each piece into your existing systems. 

Whether you want to start small with better qualification or build toward a fully automated workflow, these systems adapt to how your team works - from feeding insights into your CRM to handling outreach automatically. 

—-
15+ years of international, multi-domain, multi-functional experience at Apple and B2B scale-ups. Expertise in applied LLMs, productivity, AI, Sales, GTM, Growth, Account Management, Team Leadership, Recruiting, and Project Management

Fun fact 🌋: I’ve been inside an active volcano.

headline: Owner, Medcalm Corporation
about:
Amy Gordon-Fisher is the President and CEO of MEDCALM Corp the premier audio/video wellness solution provider in the US and works in partnership with hospitals to bring to fruition the best possible patient outcomes.    With the  Medcalm Channel, patients experience less anxiety and discomfort, providing a better overall visit and increased patient satisfaction. Our extensive program libraries bring the leading relaxation response techniques and renowned holistic practitioners to patient care environments including specific content for adults, children, oncology  and geriatric patients. The Medcalm Channel, Blue Monkey Planet Channel, SO Smart!Channel, Colors in Motion,and The HealthCare Chaplaincy Network spiritual channel for patient television currently works with the most progressive, patient centered hospitals nationwide.

After a medical procedure, Amy became aware of how anxious she and other patients were before and during treatment. Inspired to find a solution, she founded Medcalm, an innovative company, dedicated to bring sound healing programs to patients . In 2005, The Medcalm Channel was launched to bring healing/ relaxation videos to the hospital TV's. Blue Monkey Planet channel :the first pediatric channel for kids in hospitals as well as SO Smart! for toddlers and babies;  Medcalming HD which is stunning nature scenes filmed in HD with ambient sound or sound healing music. Medcalm Senior was developed for hospitals, nursing homes and assisted living facilities.In 2015, New additions are The HealthCare Chaplaincy Network TV spiritual channel and Colors In Motion:Fine Art. In 2018 our new offering is "Sleepscapes" to address that issue and help eliminate hospital noises.  Medcalm partners with Allen Tech, GetWellNetwork, Sonifi, MDM, Telehealth, TVRCommunications, Lincor, OneView, eVideon and Hopitel in Canada..

Specialties: Conceptual talent, creative sales, marketing, deal maker, closer.

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 21, 2024, Miguel was Mohamed’s mentor
receivedRecommendations.description:
If I were to compare Mohamed to something non-work related, he would be fire - because he is, and yes he is. 

In typical organizations, Mohamed will more likely be an above average employee - because typical managers will try to contain or traditionally manage an individual like Mohamed. What happens though when you try to contain fire goes from limiting all applications to said manager’s understanding (short ceiling) or choking out the fire. I wonder what will happen if we did the opposite - like grabbing more wood for the fire to consume or allowing for combustion? I definitely feel privileged being able to witness, utilize and collaborate with him.

Mohamed or Mo and I met in non-ordinary circumstances which already says plenty about him - he is a focused individual who is not afraid to make mistakes who can both make business cases for technology or technology use cases for a business. He aspires for greatness - though he already is great, he is humble and continuing to learn. He has so much potential because he is able to apply most of his learnings into practical use in business and/or technology. He is extremely innovative because he isn’t afraid to try nor too prideful to fail - he simply yearns to apply his knowledge to the best possible solution today no matter the situation

If you’re thinking of hiring Mohamed, please do yourself a favor and do not ask “is Mo a good candidate?” Instead, ask yourself, “can my organization handle a person like Mo?” or “is my organization prepared to listen to new ideas so we can breakthrough our ceiling?”

Or simply put - when you see fire, does it make you think of getting burned or does it make you think of combustion engines and thermal energy that will propel your organization into the next technological age?

headline: CEO of FUBU and The Shark Group, TV Personality on ABC Shark Tank, Public Speaker
about:
From humble beginnings to a self-made multimillionaire with over $6 billion to date in global product sales and a starring role on ABC’s newest business reality TV show, Shark Tank, Daymond John is the personification of the American Dream. He continues to set standards of excellence while expanding his interests in fashion, branding, marketing, consulting, entertainment, and beyond. This industry leader, best-selling author, and ground breaking entrepreneurial expert has evolved into a highly sought after business and motivational speaker.

As a dynamic business speaker with over twenty years of hands-on proven business experience, Daymond shares the strategies that continue to bring him financial success. As Founder and CEO, Daymond steered FUBU from a mere concept to a global fashion powerhouse with annual retail sales exceeding $350 million at its peak. Utilizing many of the same tactics commonly used today, Daymond John pioneered the art of integrating fashion, culture, and music nearly twenty years ago. From his then unprecedented guerrilla marketing and branding techniques to the continuously innovative ways in which he uses social media, brand integration, and his expertise on pop culture, Daymond remains a cutting edge business strategist.

Daymond teaches audience members how to apply his successful methods to a wide range of businesses today. He shares winning tips for negotiating and negotiating for women, boosting sales, improving employee morale, increasing productivity, and optimizing staff talents.

As a motivational speaker, Daymond’s quintessential rags-to-riches success story of sacrifice, hard work, and perseverance as well as the unique and charismatic way he communicates it, will inspire any audience.

Specialties: •	Business Strategy
•	International Business Branding
•	Branding Expert
•	Celebrity Alignment
•	Brand Development
•	Brand Management
•	National & International C-Suite Consulting
•	Designer
•	Marketing
•	Motivational Speaker
•	Author

location.linkedinText: New York, New York, United States

parsed.text: New York City, NY, United States

experience.description: "Shark Tank" is a business reality television series by acclaimed TV producer Mark Burnett (Survivor, The Apprentice) that airs on ABC Network. As one of the “Sharks,” Daymond John, and four other prominent executives, listen to business pitches from everyday people who hope to launch their company or product to new heights. Investing his own money in every project, Daymond John becomes partners with the entrepreneurs and helps them turn their aspirations into a reality. Millions of viewers tune into the show as John demonstrates his marketing prowess and entrepreneurial insights.

In a world saturated with marketing and advertising companies, The Shark Group distinguishes itself through non-traditional and innovative approaches in raising product awareness, while engaging the target audience and stirring emotion in consumers through entertainment.

Our integration techniques will elevate your product's status to new heights as we communicate your company's core message in a completely new fashion. We pride ourselves in strong client relationships and partnerships in order to not only meet our clients' goals, but to exceed them.

The company was founded in 1992 by Daymond John with a line of hats made in his house in Hollis, Queens, New York. According to the company website, John mortgaged his own home for $100,000 and with that seed money he and his three friends Carl Brown, J. Alexander Martin, and Keith Perrin, turned half of his house into a factory and the other half into living space.

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 30, 2025, Nepos was Mili’s client
receivedRecommendations.description:
I worked with Mili on my job search in 2023.  She was recommended by a friend who has worked with her in the past.  My first impression was how much time she put in my resume content before scheduling a call with me.  By the time we got on the call, she knew every point of my resume including my experience, the layout of the resume, the clarity of the message, and ALL the details my professional resume checker did not see.  During the first call, we spent 1hr talking about my background, the opportunities she was seeng in the market and what companies were looking for after covid-19.  In the next call, we focused on business model/area where she thought I will have chance of success, she made sure my experience was told through my resume in simple language with clear and measurable results.

Within two weeks, I had interview lined up and that was the only interview I had and got offer within 24hrs.  She negotiated all the contract conditions on my behalf after I told her what I wanted and the contract was more than perfect.
Mili is that person who takes every candidate like a personal challenge and puts incredible time with all the details.  She can make you feel like your resume was written by 8th grade student.  She asks very smart and detailed questions in order for her to find a good fit for you.  She is not someone who sends your resume to any company just to get you a job.  Her logic is that a candidate should get a job which matches the candidate aspirations and should be the candidate dream job.  Her time spent to matching candidate background and candidate next job is incredible.  I would commend Mili to anybody who wants to get next big bang, global companies and global brands.  She works with big international and global companies

headline: I find the best human to solve your business problem, as a deep-listening introvert.
about:
As they say, insanity is doing the same thing over again and expecting different results. If you haven't been happy with traditional agency recruiters, how about considering someone from a non-traditional background?

My story goes Math+Astrophysics->C# Test Code at Microsoft->Technical Recruiter->HR Director->Recruiting Agency owner. Here's how each of my experiences shaped me:

Science: I learned about asking questions and making observations. 
Testing: I learned to question those and stay skeptical. 
In-house recruiting: I gained an obsession with finding great, long-term fits that solve business problems rather than making placements. 
HR: I care very much about each candidate as a person, and treat each client's business as my own.

When you work with me, you get:
White glove service for both you and your candidates, never ghosting
Flexible payment terms (hourly preferred, retained/contingent possible)
Flexible work arrangement (I can do anything you need done, from spinning up a role from scratch to close, or pick things up at any stage along the way)
Great at building or streamlining processes that are designed with pragmatism in mind
Can work as an embedded member of your team

BTW, I'm a digital nomad, thus not available for onsite roles in NYC. It's where I have my strongest network, however.

If anything I blabber about is helpful, would you get me a coffee? https://buymeacoffee.com/tatiana_kristine

topSkills: Recruiting • Technical Recruiting • ATS • Business Process • Human Resources

experience.description: NIAH is a boutique staffing agency that provides individualized attention and exceptional service, cultivating partnerships with everyone from small companies with less than 10 employees to hedge funds with over 1,000 employees. Running NIAH, I have managed up to 45 people and grew the business to over 2MM/yr in revenue.

Built out 2 coffee shops from scratch, and grew them into some of the most well respected in Seattle. Added food to them by building out a kitchen and hiring a chef. Manage hiring, people management, press, planning, and finance.

And yes, it is possible to manage a business remotely. The secret is hiring amazing people that you can trust.

Everything people side in a tight-knit e-commerce company of just north of 40 employees. I helped build culture, managed the recruiting process, facilitated feedback, managed the HR budget, advised on benefits providers, put policies and procedures into place, administered payroll, and answered tons of questions. I lead a PEO switch to save the company $80K per year, performed due diligence on an acquisition, performed a full-company salary review, built our review system from the ground up, and formed a company dodgeball team.  In short, I holistically make sure that everyone is happy, healthy, and kicking butt at work.

After scoring 750 (99th percentile) on my GMAT, I started helping others to achieve their best results. I teach online courses all over the US and the world (even Hong Kong!), and provide MBA consulting for applicants submitting applications to top schools.

Helped talented developers, ops folks, and product gurus find the right place at Etsy. Also, processed visas, created analytics for management, created recruiting strategy, worked with management on staffing plans, and championed candidate experience initiatives.

As the sole technical recruiter, I brought on one new hire per week, including Front and Back End developers, Data Engineers, C Developers, and Operations personnel. AppNexus is an advertising technology company managing billions of transactions and multiple TBs of data a day.

Sourced and screened development, test, and program management candidates for various small and large companies in both Seattle and on the East Coast (Virtuoso, Reality Gap, Panopto, Popcap Games, Expedia, Swype, Bridgewater Associates) then made recommendations on those qualified for further interviews. Candidates ranged from entry level to 20+ years of experience. Top accomplishment was placing 11 candidates at Expedia and 2 at Panopto in a two month span.

Created literature for all trade shows, which involved translating technical specifications into an attractive business proposition, and working with our design firm. Wrote training manuals. Company successfully exited through an acquisition by Starbucks.

As a recruiter, I was responsible for all technical recruiting at six universities in the United States,including one that is the largest source of entry level developers for Microsoft. Create strategies for each school to hit hiring goals.Plan events, select and prepare attendees, and attend career fairs, talks, and college campus interviews.Select candidates for onsite interviews, and review interview feedback to make group and position recommendations. Build and maintain relationships with candidates and attendees. Maintain relationships with top candidates and professors. Build relationships with high level employees at Microsoft, up to VP level, to leverage them to sell to top talent. Track candidates in Excel and XpTen management software. Ensure interns succeed in their internships and join the company full time upon completion through constant reviewing and interaction. Created strategies adopted group wide in order to meet ever-expanding recruitment goals. Joined the group as a Sr. Recruiter, leveled with the best and most senior members of the group. Nearly doubled all time hiring record at Iowa State University, and hit or exceeded all other hiring goals.

headline: Divorce Coach | Immigration/Divorce Attorney | TEDx Speaker | Bestselling Author | Helping High Powered Individuals, Professionals & Companies Navigate Divorce, Burnout & Emotional Recovery
about:
"Divorce is both a legal battle and an emotional war zone—yet most people only prepare for one."

I'm Poonam Bhuchar—TEDx speaker, bestselling author of SAFE from the Pain, 24-year attorney, and divorce coach. After spending time in the courtroom and surviving my own traumatic divorce, I realized something powerful:

👉 People don’t just need a lawyer.
👉 They need someone who understands the emotional chaos, the identity loss, and the decision paralysis that come with ending a marriage.

That’s why I created the SAFE Method—a unique framework that blends Stop, Accept, Forgive, and Embrace to guide professionals, women, and high-net-worth individuals through the most destabilizing transitions of their lives.

🔹 Who I Help:
Individuals ready to rebuild after divorce—without shame or second-guessing.

Professionals & executives facing emotional burnout from personal upheaval.

Corporations seeking to support employee wellbeing during major life transitions.

Media and platforms looking for expert commentary on emotional resilience, divorce, and legal strategy.

🔹 Why Work With Me?
I’m not just a coach—I’m a seasoned attorney who’s handled hundreds of complex divorce cases.  I help you with the emotional aspect, paperwork, guidance based on my legal knowledge and discuss how to get what you want based on your values and needs all without being billed per hour.

I’ve been featured on TEDx, Forbes Riley, David Meltzer, and co-authored a book with Les Brown.

I’ve built strategic partnerships with wealth managers, debt experts, and estate planners to support the full divorce journey.

🔹 Ready to Take the Next Step?
Let’s talk if you're:

Navigating a divorce and feel stuck in overwhelm

Looking for a powerful speaker on emotional wellbeing & resilience

A company ready to support your employees through major life shifts


📅 Book a consultation or media inquiry via my profile


Testimonials:

experience.description:
Finance and HR leader driving growth from 19 to 70+ stores.   Summit is backed by New Mountain Capital (PE firm) with the goal to consolidate the car wash industry.

Built finance and HR team to support explosive growth and ensure accretive capital is deployment.  Converted accounting function from 4 providers, 30 account payable systems, 30 payroll providers, 90+ bank accounts -> to -> one finance team, one GL (5 day close), one AP, one payroll provider and a world class treasury processes to minimize working capital.

Centre Lane Partners is a private investment firm focused on making credit and equity, control and non-control, investments in North American middle market companies.

Recruited to drive rapid turnaround of portfolio companies, leveraging expertise in Finance to drive investment model. Typical roles is interim CEO/CFO and integration leader.

Digitech Computer is a private equity backed company that operates revenue cycle management (RCM) services in the EMS space of the healthcare industry (largest in the US). Our model is to bill and collect ambulance transports across the country for municipalities and private companies.

CFO in charge of company Finance and Human Resources.   Completed acquisition of R1 EMS business and sale of company (successful exit) to Sarnova.

TheraCare delivers therapy for ~5,000 children a day in the Autistic and early intervention space.  CFO in charge of company Finance, IT, HR and Billing teams.   Led team to maximize the use of data analytics to drive operational decisions and process improvements.

experience.position: Chief Financial Officer - SCA Acela Group
experience.description: CFO for division with 32 Surgery Centers plus one hospital which delivered 110,000+ surgeries in 2017 and an EBITDA of +60MM. Rebuilt finance team and processes to align with growth strategy of the company.   Played an important role in guiding the company to strong same site growth and acquisitions.  Company and division was sold to UnitedHealth Group.
Various roles - FP&A, Risk, Best Practice Sharing and Marketing.   Multiple roles in data analytics in finance and risk.

receivedRecommendations.description: Three concepts come to mind when reflecting on my work with Tomas Chadwick – he is tenacious, he is persistent, and he gets things done.  Even though Tomas comes from the finance world, he operates unlike any other finance leader I have worked with in the past.  With a sense of urgency, he has great clarity in breaking down walls, and Tomas is not afraid to think out of the box to come up with creative solutions to challenging problems.  I have seen Tomas navigate challenging situations with great grace, and I have learned a lot from his ability to get things done.  Personally, I have been the better for having had the opportunity to work closely with Tomas.
